mapper.sql: pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId",type AS "type",task_id AS "taskId",enclosure AS "enclosure",pick_lists_name AS "pickListsName",user_ids AS "userIds" ,remarks AS "remarks",note AS "note" , coding AS "coding" ,user_id AS "userId", source AS "source", source_id AS "sourceId", create_user AS "createUser", update_user AS "updateUser", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime", display AS "display", deptId AS "deptId", status AS "status"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_production_pick_lists where 1 = 1
and pick_lists_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and source_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sourceId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and pick_lists_id in
#{state}

select user_id AS "userId", create_time AS "createTime" from sys_user where 1 = 1 and status = "ENABLE"
and user_id = #{paramCondition.userId}

SELECT lists.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", lists.user_id AS "userId", lists.create_time AS "createTime" FROM daoxin_production_pick_lists lists LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_cart cart ON lists.pick_lists_id = cart.pick_lists_id where 1=1 and lists.status != 49
and (lists.user_id = #{paramCondition.userId} or cart.create_user = #{paramCondition.userId} )
and (create_time between CONCAT(#{paramCondition.beginTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{paramCondition.endTime},' 23:59:59'))

select lists.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", lists.user_id AS "userId", sum(detail.number) AS "detailCount", sum(detail.received_number) AS "doneNumber", lists.create_time AS "createTime" from `daoxin_production_pick_lists` lists LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail detail on lists.pick_lists_id = detail.pick_lists_id GROUP BY lists.user_id

select
lists.type AS "type", count(*) AS "orderCount", lists.create_time AS "createTime", lists.create_user AS "createUser" from `daoxin_production_pick_lists` lists LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail detail on lists.pick_lists_id = detail.pick_lists_id where 1=1
and date_format(lists.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(lists.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY lists.type

select
count(pick_lists_id) AS "orderCount", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", status AS "status" from `daoxin_production_pick_lists` where 1 = 1
and date_format(lists.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(lists.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY status

select
count(*) AS "orderCount", lists.create_time AS "createTime", lists.create_user AS "createUser", lists.status AS "status" from `daoxin_production_pick_lists` lists LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail detail on lists.pick_lists_id = detail.pick_lists_id
where 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY lists.create_user ORDER BY count(*) DESC

SELECT lists.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", lists.create_time AS "createTime", lists.create_user AS "createUser", count( DISTINCT detail.sku_id ) AS "outSkuCount", sum( detail.number ) AS "outNumCount" FROM `daoxin_production_pick_lists` lists LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail detail ON lists.pick_lists_id = detail.pick_lists_id WHERE 1 = 1
and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.beginTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and date_format(create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY lists.create_user ORDER BY sum( detail.number ) DESC

select
from daoxin_production_pick_lists where 1 = 1
and pick_lists_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and source_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sourceId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')

select
from daoxin_production_pick_lists where 1 = 1
and pick_lists_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and source_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sourceId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')

select
from daoxin_production_pick_lists where 1 = 1
and pick_lists_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsId},'%')
and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and source_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sourceId},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')

SELECT a.pick_lists_id AS "pickListsId", a.type AS "type", a.task_id AS "taskId", a.enclosure AS "enclosure", a.pick_lists_name AS "pickListsName", a.user_ids AS "userIds", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.note AS "note", a.coding AS "coding", a.user_id AS "userId", a.source AS "source", a.source_id AS "sourceId", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.display AS "display", a.deptId AS "deptId", a.STATUS AS "status", IF(sum( b.number ) is null ,0,sum( b.number )) AS "numberCount", IF(SUM( b.received_number ) is null ,0,SUM( b.received_number )) AS "receivedCount" FROM `daoxin_production_pick_lists` a LEFT JOIN daoxin_production_pick_lists_detail b ON a.pick_lists_id = b.pick_lists_id AND b.display = 1 where 1 = 1 and a.display = 1
and a.pick_lists_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.pickListsId},'%')
and a.user_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userId},'%')
and a.source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and a.source_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sourceId},'%')
and a.create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and a.update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and a.create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and a.update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and a.display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and a.deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and a.status like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.status},'%')
and a.source like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.source},'%')
and a.source_id = #{paramCondition.sourceId}
and a.source_id in
#{item}
GROUP BY a.pick_lists_id
